solution_line_template: So it took {expedition_years}+{research_years}=<<{expedition_years}+{research_years}={first_artifact_total_years}>>{first_artifact_total_years} years for the first artifact

It takes {first_artifact_total_years}*{second_artifact_time_multiplier}=<<{first_artifact_total_years}*{second_artifact_time_multiplier}={second_artifact_total_years}>>{second_artifact_total_years} years for the second
So in total it took {first_artifact_total_years}+{second_artifact_total_years}=<<{first_artifact_total_years}+{second_artifact_total_years}={total_time}>>{total_time} years to find both
